vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the master agreement contract with U.S. Intelliwake LLC to provide electronic invoicing and reporting resources to local governments through the North Texas Share Cooperative Purchasing Program to include the software invoicing capabilities for 2025 Slurry Seal and Polymer Modified Micro Surfacing Contract, 2025 Annual Street Maintenance Contract and 2025 Annual Street Resurfacing Contract - Not to exceed $123,487.03 - Financing: Bond Program Administration Fund
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the master agreement contract with U.S. Intelliwake LLC to provide electronic invoicing and reporting resources to local governments through the North Texas Share Cooperative Purchasing Program to include the software invoicing capabilities for 2025 Slurry Seal and Polymer Modified Micro Surfacing Contract, 2025 Annual Street Maintenance Contract and 2025 Annual Street Resurfacing Contract - Not to exceed $123,487.03 - Financing: Bond Program Administration Fund
